page.title: 02FERRY BOAT INN WASHINGBORO.
page.content: THE {FERRY BOAT INN}HAS BEEN IN WASHINGBOROUGH SINCE{1625.}IT IS CALLED THE FERRY BOAT BECAUSE ORIGINALLY THE {RIVER WITHAM }RAN ALONG THE MAIN ROAD. THE LANDLORD CONTROLLED THE FERRY AND USED TO TAKE PEOPLE ACROSS THE RIVER.TWENTY PEOPLE WERE DROWNED ONE YEAR WHEN THE FERRY WAS {OVERLOADED. THE LANDLORD WHO IS THERE NOW HAS BEEN THERE FOR 3 YEARS IN OCTOBER 1985. THE MAIN DRINK SOLD THERE FROM BEER,SPIRITS AND WINE IS{BEER. THEY ALSO SELL LOTS OF MEALS IN A WEEK. THE NEWEST CHANGE IS AN EXTENSION ON TO THE CAR PARK AT THE BACK.THERE IS A CELLAR IN THE PUB. THE PUB IS NOT USED FOR ANY OTHER ACTIVITIES.THE CHURCH AT THE BACK DOES NOT OWN ANY OF THE LAND AROUND THE THE PUB.THE LANDLORD PAYS ALL THE TAXES. THE OPENING HOURS ARE 11-2.30,6-11.P.M
